entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper and Care of Magical Creatures teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is wearing a large, red, luminous star on the back of his moleskin vest.

entities.name: professor moody
entities.description: Professor Moody is an Auror and Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is wearing a large, red, luminous star on his hat.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is the Transfiguration teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. She is wearing a large, red, luminous star on her hat.

entities.name: professor flitwick
entities.description: Professor Flitwick is the Charms teacher at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. He is wearing a large, red, luminous star on his hat.

entities.name: bagman
entities.description: Bagman is a wizard who is involved in the Triwizard Tournament. He is standing near Hagrid and the champions.

relationships.description: Hagrid and Bagman are standing near each other in the stadium.
Professor Moody and Bagman are standing near each other in the stadium.
Professor McGonagall and Bagman are standing near each other in the stadium.
Professor Flitwick and Bagman are standing near each other in the stadium.
